title: Womens Maxi Dress

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress cute, well-made, and comfortable, with one noting it's particularly suitable for hot weather. Moreover, they appreciate its flattering fit, with one mentioning it hits just above the knee, and its ability to accommodate different body types. However, the sizing and color accuracy receive mixed feedback - while some say it's sized perfectly, others find it runs big, and while many love the color, some say it's not as advertised. Additionally, opinions are divided on the dress's transparency, with some finding it opaque while others say it's too see-through. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice quality and fit
items.body: This dress fits very true to size. The dress is not see through other than the sleeves are a thinner material. The length hits about mid to lower thigh on me. The quality is very nice and doesn’t feel cheap and not a waste of money. Read more
items.author: Alyssa

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Teen approved
items.body: I bought this for my daughter to wear as part of her Halloween costume this past October. Once the dress came and she tried it on, we both knew it would get a lot of wear beyond the costume. The fit is flattering and the color is a beautiful strawberry red. The only thing I would suggest is to size up one size. My daughter wears a small or xs in most brands but the medium fit her spot on. If you're unsure of which size to get, try ordering two different sizes to see which fits you best. Other than that, this dress is absolutely adorable on and can easily be dressed up or down. Read more
items.author: StacyG

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress
items.body: Such a beautiful dress. I wore it to my graduation. I ordered and it fit true to size. Read more
items.author: Rebekka

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress
items.body: Arrived quickly, pretty decent quality and it fit perfectly. The shoulders tend to slide off which was a little frustrating, but overall it's a a super cute dress. Read more
items.author: DropkickMommy

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress, poor fit in the chest
items.body: Beautiful dress. Doesn't fit me in the chest area but there is enough fabric to hide how my ladies are a bit squished. Read more
items.author: Sara

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to size
items.body: Absolutely loved! It’s high quality and not see through. Very comfortable too. Color was just as pictured. Read more
items.author: savannah

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute!!!
items.body: Cute dress true to size Read more
items.author: My dogs can't get enough of these and they really helped with there alegries and gut problems

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute and Comfortable
items.body: I got a size small and I typically wear size small. I am a size 4 and 5'3. This dress fits perfectly and the tie in the back makes it very adjustable for your bust. I have on white shorts underneath as it is a bit see through with dark underwear. It's the type of fabric that catches static easily so I would definitely recommend a static spray when you wear it. Overall really nice dress. Cons for me are the thin fabric and the static. Read more
items.author: Destiny

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, A1 Black, Blue, Apricot, A1 White, Hot Pink, Orange, 1aa Grey, Dark Green, Mint Green, Red, Khaki, Pink, Purple. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
